item.title: Suspect in two robberies of the same Sarasota bank is arrested
item.description: In both cases, no one was injured and an undisclosed amount of money was taken.

item.title: More than 200 cats rescued in Manatee County
item.description: More than 200 cats rescued in Manatee County

item.title: Two retail theft suspects part of a larger crime ring, Venice police say
item.description: Venice police say this arrest is a big step forward in dismantling a theft ring.

item.title: Hot and Humid Saturday
item.description: Our surface dew points stay summertime-high, near 75° to 77°. That means our “Feels Like” temps will climb to 105° to 110°!

item.title: Mote Marine, Veterans, and Students Team Up for Coral Restoration in the Florida Keys
item.description: Advanced research, coral reef restoration, and rehabilitation for veterans.

item.title: Farmer’s Markets Saturday Forecast
item.description: Our “Feels Like” temps climb to 105° to 110°

item.title: More than 200 cats rescued from Manatee County home
item.description: The cats were removed after the resident reached out to authorities for help.

item.title: Beach & Boating Forecast Saturday
item.description: Water temps are reported at 88° at most beaches. Thunderstorms chances are extremely low Saturday

item.title: Ford assembly worker’s lost wallet found 11 years later by mechanic working on car
item.description: A Ford assembly worker's lost wallet has been found 11 years later by a mechanic working on a car.

item.title: Saturday Afternoon and Evening Forecast
item.description: Thunderstorm chances are very low for the weekend, although a brief, isolated shower could pop up on the Suncoast Sunday

item.title: A grenade is missing from the scene of an explosion that killed 3 LA deputies
item.description: A grenade is missing from the scene of an explosion at a Los Angeles County Sheriff’s Department training facility.

item.title: Hot, Humid and Dry Weekend
item.description: A Heat Advisory is in effect for the Suncoast until 7 PM Saturday
